site_name: SOUTH RUISLIP AND WEST RUISLIP WORKSITES (5NO)
decision_conditions: This approval relates to the following proposed changes to the existing approval:
1. Copthall North Worksite east access: Additional access off Breakspear Road South into the eastern end of the Copthall north worksite

2. Copthall North Worksite west access: Re-location of the existing access at the western end of the Copthall North Worksite to a point approximately 100m north in order to facilitate construction of Harvil Road (scheduled work no. 1/77).
description: Request for approval of non-material changes under Schedule 17 paragraph 21(1) of the High Speed Rail (London  West Midlands) Act 2017, relating to  the existing approved lorry route (LBH approval reference 75369/APP/2020/4264) ,to provide  1. Additional access off Breakspear Road South into the eastern end of the Copthall North worksite 2. Re-location of the existing access (Gate 2) at the western end of the Copthall North Worksite to a point approximately 100m north.
